amendment.description: Amendment prohibited use of funds in the bill for propaganda purposes, and directed the DOD Inspector General and GAO to report on whether or not the defense analysts program violated the propaganda provisions of Department of Defense appropriations bills for Fiscal Years 2002 through 2008.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 56 printed in House Report 110-666 to provide that no funds authorized in the bill may be used for propaganda purposes, and direct the DOD Inspector General and GAO to report on whether or not the defense analysts program violated the propaganda provisions of Department of Defense appropriations bills for Fiscal Years 2002 through 2008.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hodes amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
